participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, dedicated to making a difference through art.
participant_1.background: I am saving up for some procedures while trying to find ways to increase my income. I work at the local bank. I sometimes burn myself while welding because I get too focused on the work and forget to take precautions. My cats and I went for long walks along the beach the last time I was on vacation.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and caring, with a love for animals and a need for creative expression.
participant_2.background: I enjoy water skiing but feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself. I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals. I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner. I like to make short films. I have a mobile that plays music in my daughter's nursery.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to water ski, but I feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself.
That's cool! I like to paint and draw. I'm also a big fan of welding.
I've always wanted to try welding! I feel like it would be a really creative outlet.
It is! It's a lot of fun, but you have to be careful not to burn yourself.
I'm sure I could be careful. I'm not afraid of a little pain.
Well, if you ever want to give it a try, let me know. I'd be happy to show you the ropes.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to make short films. I'm not very good at it, but it's a lot of fun.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to make a short film.
It's a lot of fun. You should definitely give it a try.
I will! Thanks for the inspiration.
